overview: Rod Majors and Cougar Cash haul in a couple of suspects off the local playground and proceed to teach them the meaning of suspicious behavior. At the Playground (a trendy new club in town) Bill Marlowe collects the entry fee the hard way from Rusty Samuels who gets caught short (but only for CASH).Next, Chance Caldwell and Max Grand perform some moving violations in a parked cop car, and finally, everyone shows up for a sexual showdown at the club.
title: Everybody Does It
